name: Detective Clockface: Greecing the Wheels of Time
name_original: Detective Clockface: Greecing the Wheels of Time
description:
You are Detective Clockface! Your task is to  go back in time and find evidence of "incongrous" items. That is, items that should not be in this time period. Take a photo when you find them. But time is running out and you must make it to the time machine before time runs out.

Created for the "Make a Level" 2020 Jam.

IMPORTANT NOTE -  On Webplayer, Mac and Windows, the Gamepad  A button referred to in the menu is SPACE. Hit SPACE to start.

Credits: Nick Anderson, Josh Davies, Ben Norris, Saffron Paffey, Steven Spicer, Oli Thompson
